org.openstack4j.api.identity

Interface RoleService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RestService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleServiceImpl

    public interface RoleService
extends RestService
    Identity Role based Operations
    Author:
    Jeremy Unruh

      • addUserRole

        roleId - the role id to add

        roleId - the role id

        tenantId - the tenant id
        userId - the user id
        roleId - the role id
